titleStmt.title: Church-incense: or Divine ejaculations: composed by that eminent and faithful servant of God, Mr. Hen. Church, published since his death by his son, Mr. N.C. Mr. of Arts of Emanuel Colledge in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Church, Hen. (Henry), fl. 1636-1638.
Church, Nathanaell.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Rothwell at the Fountain and Bear in Cheap-side.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "August. 3 1654"; the second 5 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
